General.Name: YTO Express Group Co Ltd
General.Description: YTO Express Group Co.,Ltd. operates express delivery business in China and internationally. It operates through Express Business, The Freight Forwarding Business, and The Aviation Business segments. The company provides collection, sorting, transshipment, and delivery services for the express delivery; and freight forwarding services and other freight forwarding services, as well as logistics and aviation services. In addition, it engages in financial leasing business; and provision of domestic time-sensitive products, international express and parcel, value-added, and warehousing services. YTO Express Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
